about_the_game:
AntarcticaRoyale Adds the mostly uninhabited continent of Antarctica into EarthRoyale!

The DLC adds 472 new provinces into the game that forms the vast antartic continental mainland!
it also adds 2 new special province types
1.Snow, Is created by some events and takes a bit until it melts into the flood province type and then into unclaimed
2.Glacier, exists from the Beginning of the game in parts of Greenland, Siberia, Canada and Antarctica and can only be turned to unclaimed land via special events!¨'

with that there obviously are some new events coming! specifically 5 new normal events and a few secrete things
1.Form Antarctic treaty, can only happen if there is none active, it gives a score/prestige penalty to any country owning any land in the continent and a extra penalty to taking more land there
2.Dissolve Antarctic treaty, gets rid of the penalty from owning land and won't give any new penalties for making new claims
3.Research base, Lets a country claim a province anywhere in unclaimed Antarctica
4. Snow storm, Creates a big area of snow around a randomly chosen province, can only do it in certain biomes
5. Melting Glaciers, Removes a glacier from the map, might do some other stuff to ;)

And lastly Antarctica won't follow the normal continent settings of "On" "Off" and "Unclaimed" instead it will go by "Research Bases". "Claims", "Glacier", "Unclaimed" and "Off"
detailed_description:
AntarcticaRoyale Adds the mostly uninhabited continent of Antarctica into EarthRoyale!

The DLC adds 472 new provinces into the game that forms the vast antartic continental mainland!
it also adds 2 new special province types
1.Snow, Is created by some events and takes a bit until it melts into the flood province type and then into unclaimed
2.Glacier, exists from the Beginning of the game in parts of Greenland, Siberia, Canada and Antarctica and can only be turned to unclaimed land via special events!¨'

with that there obviously are some new events coming! specifically 5 new normal events and a few secrete things
1.Form Antarctic treaty, can only happen if there is none active, it gives a score/prestige penalty to any country owning any land in the continent and a extra penalty to taking more land there
2.Dissolve Antarctic treaty, gets rid of the penalty from owning land and won't give any new penalties for making new claims
3.Research base, Lets a country claim a province anywhere in unclaimed Antarctica
4. Snow storm, Creates a big area of snow around a randomly chosen province, can only do it in certain biomes
5. Melting Glaciers, Removes a glacier from the map, might do some other stuff to ;)

And lastly Antarctica won't follow the normal continent settings of "On" "Off" and "Unclaimed" instead it will go by "Research Bases". "Claims", "Glacier", "Unclaimed" and "Off"
name: AntarcticaRoyale
short_description: This DLC adds the entire continent of Antarctica to the game along with new events, province types and more!
